name: Rollin' (itch) (Spaint)
description:
Go out into the woods, bring home some food, upgrade your skills, get even more food.

In this game you'll have to face the difficulties of an adorable hedgehog's life, roll over them and show everyone that you are the fastest and the most agile hedgehog in the world!

Controls

ESC - Pause

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Slow roll

With item on your back:

Q - Drop one item

Credits
